Title: Establishes the real estate appraiser task force
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of taxation and finance shall convene a ten member real estate appraiser task force to investigate and identify the misevaluation of the asset of this category of professionals and develop ways to overcome the biased behavior; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing the real estate appraiser task force; and to repeal such provisions upon expiration thereof
